name: Mirror Match (srogee, lazerlokque, dacode45)
description:
A wave-based third person shooter with a twist: the floor is a portal to a mirror dimension. Survive as long as you can and post your high score!

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Space to jump.
  • Shift (hold) to run.
  • Left click to shoot - you can shoot through the mirrored floor to the other side!
  • Right click (hold) to aim down sights.
  • Ctrl to toggle crouch.
  • While in the air, press Ctrl to dive - if you're above the mirror, you'll switch to the other dimension.
  • Walking over the orange glowing pads will let you jump high. You can get to the upper levels of the arena.

Combat:

  • Grunts will follow you around and shoot at you.
  • Turrets will spawn on various surfaces and shoot at you.
  • Enemy silhouettes will show you where the enemies are. Some might be hiding in the mirror dimension!
  • Your health will slowly regenerate over time.

Note - there are some issues with foliage materials not showing up correctly in the packaged game that we weren't able to resolve at time of submission. Healthbars also show up twice for enemies.
